name: String. Name of the melee weapon.
reflective: Boolean. Whether or not the weapon can reflect bullets.
auto: Boolean. Whether the weapon fires continuously.
droppable: Boolean. Whether the item can be dropped upon death,

normal.__comment: Default stats when no perks are active.
normal.noArmor: Boolean. Whether or not the weapon ignores armor.
normal.noStone: Boolean. Whether or not the weapon ignores stone.
normal.cleave: Boolean. Whether or not the weapon can hit multiple things at once.
normal.damageDelay: Number. Delay of damage in milliseconds.
normal.cooldown: Number. Delay between attacks in milliseconds.

offset.__comment: To make sense of offsets, we assume to player is facing right.
offset.y: Number. Up/Down offset. Note that y is positive downwards.

normal.radius: Number. Attack radius in game units.

visuals.animation: Array of string. All possible animations.
